thread.section_title: Amba Hotel Charing Cross - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Hotel Team Ever
thread.title_full: Best Hotel Team Ever - Review of Amba Hotel Charing Cross, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: RichardwHWLI
title: Best Hotel Team Ever
text:
My husband took me to this hotel for my Birthday and from checking in to checking out the hotel, accommodation and standard of service was excellent. We have stayed in a lot of hotels here in the UK and abroad (especially the USA) and I must say this is one of the very best. Thank you everyone at the Amba Hotel for making my Birthday extra special
Room Tip: Room was amazing and for a London hotel very spacious. Bed was really comfortable too. See more room tips
